# alignsResumptionWithPrimarySegmentBoundary

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the resumption time of primary playback should snap to a segment boundary of the primary asset.

## Declaration

```swift
var alignsResumptionWithPrimarySegmentBoundary: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

If the value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the system adjusts the resumption time of primary playback following an interstitial to the nearest segment boundary when the primary player is playing an HTTP Live Streaming asset.

## Inspecting timing

- **time**: A time within the timeline of the primary content that playback of interstitial content begins.
- **date**: A date within the date range of the primary content that playback of interstitial content begins.
- **willPlayOnce**: A Boolean value that indicates whether to schedule this event one time only and suppress subsequent replay.
- **resumptionOffset**: A time offset at which playback of primary content resumes after interstitial content finishes.
- **playoutLimit**: The time offset at which playback of the interstitial ends.
- **alignsStartWithPrimarySegmentBoundary**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the start time of interstitial playback should snap to a segment boundary of the primary asset.
